user.description: Proud husband and father of seven.  Businessman, former two-term Governor of Utah, former Ambassador to China and Singapore. Follow campaign at @Jon2012HQ

text: Job growth is still unacceptably low. President Obama refuses to take on the bold tax and reg reforms we need. I will.
name: JonHuntsman
boldText: Job growth is still unacceptably low. President Obama refuses to take on the bold tax and reg reforms we need. I will.
